Introduction
This topic contains information on specific deductions for gross business income and disability or death expenses, including
gross business income deductions
disability/death expense deductions
application of disability/death expense deductions
developing for disability/death expense deductions
, and
FINANCIAL screen entries for disability/death expense deductions
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K - Other Deductible Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section K
